#summary recipe to update APT repository
#labels Phase-Deploy

Download section is an APT repository. In order to update it (delete, add files), all files must first be locally downloaded to a directory Then, within this directory:

  - add new deb and source packages
  - if a package needs to be removed, delete it (also delete or deprecate it on Google Code site)
  - dpkg-scanpackages . | gzip -9 - > Packages.gz
  - dpkg-scansources . | geip -9 - > Sources

Upload new deb and source packages, as well as Packages.gz and Sources.
